channel.title: SAMUEL Z GUO
channel.description: Recent content on SAMUEL Z GUO

item.title: ABOUT
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my website. I’m Sam. I like to tinker with things. Professionally, that means building machine learning models and other AI tools. Personally, I enjoy playing electric guitar, cooking, woodworking, and other creative activities. I’m currently a machine learning engineer at Hive AI, where I work on building robust image and text classifiers for enterprise solutions. Recently, I’ve been training large language models for chat and assistant applications.

item.title: CONTACT
item.description: Connections make the world go round, so I’m happy to meet people from all walks of life. For most professional purposes, I can be reached on LinkedIn. Otherwise, feel free to send me an email at samuelzguo@gmail.com.
